name: AutoDungeon2D
description:
Where Auto Battler meets Dungeon Crawlers. AutoDungeon2D allows you to build a party of up to 4 characters and face the trials of the dungeon. With different characters and enemies, each with their own attributes and skills, you will have to experiment and see if your party can make it to the end!

Controls

Left Mouse Button - Select

Right Mouse Button - Deselect

Escape - Brings up menu

Tips
  • You can combine characters to level them up!
  • You can click on characters/enemies to reveal their stats and abilities!
  • You can change the animation speed in the settings!
  • You can 'sell' potential party members for 0 coins, allowing you to generate new heroes!
